interface.name: org.alljoyn.FileTransfer.Read
interface.description: This interface provides methods for performing chunky file reads

method.name: StartChunkRead
method.description: Method that starts a chunky read data transfer from a producer to a consumer.

method.name: ReadNextChunk
method.description: Method that returns the next sequential chunk of data from a producer to a consumer.

method.name: StopChunkRead
method.description: Method that terminates the in progress read operation of the current session.
